import { TableContainer, Table, TableHead, TableBody, TableCell, Paper, } from '@mui/material' import CrudUnit from '../molecules/crudUnit/crudUnit' import CrudAdd from '../molecules/crudUnit/crudAdd' const style = { margin: "0 auto", width: "90%" } function CrudUnitTable(props: any) { const payments = props.data const columnNames = props.columnNames const propsStyle = props.style return( <> {columnNames.map((columnName: any)=>( {columnName} ))} {payments.map((payment: any)=>( ))}
{columnNames.map((columnName: any)=>( {columnName} ))}
) } export default CrudUnitTable
